channel.title: dog on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in dog on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Hanging out with Michael Monkey
item.description: 23:27 Wednesday 20 March 2019 PDT Been sick as a dog for most of it, but I have had a great time hanging out at Michael Monkey’s in Houston. Thanks to Great Granny Good Witch for driving me to the store today to buy clothes and toiletries which should last a good while. She has a lot lot lotta masks from around the world! I have made a good start on the puzzle in the dining room, first expanding the table, then adding more white backing, then rotating the inner white backing to reduce waste.

item.title: banana split and dog shopping
item.description:
11:57 Saturday 16 December 2017 -02 Shop called Banana Split
I was entertained that Gabana can come inside shopping.

item.title: Chillin at Rodrigo's
item.description: 21:25 Friday 15 December 2017 Lin and I are hanging out with Rodrigo at his place. His dog Gabana seems to like me!

item.title: A Dog's Purpose
item.description: 11:36 Monday 09 October 2017 JST Lin likes dogs, so I plan to preview this movie to see if she’d like it. 11:41 Monday 09 October 2017 JST Just for the record, there were approximately 5 minutes of ads before the movie started after I pressed play. 11:58 Monday 09 October 2017 JST I turned it off. Bailey was poorly trained.
